players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night and confirmed. He knows I'm detective, so he's likely lying. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I was with Alice the whole night, we were in the kitchen. I didn't kill Charlie. I think Diana is lying about the investigation. Vote Alice."
You: "I was with Bob in the kitchen all night. Bob was with me, so he couldn't have killed Charlie. Diana, I'm not convinced your investigation is correct."
You: "Bob, I saw you leave the kitchen. If you were with me, why not mention it? I think you're lying. Vote Bob."
Bob: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob knows I'm detective, so he lies. Alice is innocent. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night and confirmed. He knows I'm detective, so he's likely lying. Vote Bob."
You: "I was with Alice the whole night, we were in the kitchen. I didn't kill Charlie. I think Diana is lying about the investigation. Vote Alice."
Alice: "I was with Bob in the kitchen all night. Bob was with me, so he couldn't have killed Charlie. Diana, I'm not convinced your investigation is correct."
Alice: "Bob, I saw you leave the kitchen. If you were with me, why not mention it? I think you're lying. Vote Bob."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob knows I'm detective, so he lies. Alice is innocent. Vote Bob."

players.name: Diana

Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night and confirmed. He knows I'm detective, so he's likely lying. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I was with Alice the whole night, we were in the kitchen. I didn't kill Charlie. I think Diana is lying about the investigation. Vote Alice."
Alice: "I was with Bob in the kitchen all night. Bob was with me, so he couldn't have killed Charlie. Diana, I'm not convinced your investigation is correct."
Alice: "Bob, I saw you leave the kitchen. If you were with me, why not mention it? I think you're lying. Vote Bob."
Bob: remained silent.
You: "Bob knows I'm detective, so he lies. Alice is innocent. Vote Bob."
